Message: The user completes the submission of the form
I created my ad last week and it has been pending for the past4 days. Why?

Hi Regina, I'm sorry to hear that your ad has been pending for so long. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Since it's been longer than that, there might be an issue with your ad or account verification. Could you please confirm if this is a new account? If so, you may need to provide additional details for verification. You can email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
